17.text: Tomorrow is the most dangerous word in your vocabulary

22.text: because while it's a symbol for hope

25.text: it can just as easily be the reason that your dreams

28.text: remain little images in your head.

34.text: Tomorrow diminishes the significance of the air that you're breathing right now.

39.text: It tells you that someday you can begin your journey

44.text: and that you can just wait and make yourself comfortable until then.

50.text: Tomorrow masks itself is an escape

54.text: for those held down by fear, those resistant to change.

58.text: It encourages you to be content where you are.

61.text: Stating that you have your whole life to get where you want to be

67.text: and for some tomorrow lasts forever.

75.text: into an excuse to never really do what you were meant to do.

84.text: Tomorrow can be worse than failing

87.text: because often it implies that there was never a beginning.

93.text: Just an idea being put off for a better time that never came.

99.text: There will never be a moment in your life.

102.text: More precious than the one you're living in.

106.text: Your heart beating in your chest, the air in your lungs, the blood in your veins.

112.text: They're giving you an opportunity to make a change.

115.text: To become who you want to become, to live, to inspire, to achieve.

122.text: Because who really knows how many tomorrows you'll get?

128.text: In the last thing you want is to look back on your life

134.text: In wish you had the courage to do what you wanted to do.

138.text: To wish that you understood, how fast tomorrow's come and go

144.text: And that all you will ever have is the present moment.

151.text: Every Journey starts with a step.

154.text: That courageous act of moving forward, not knowing, what tomorrow will bring.

160.text: Only knowing that you'll be further along then than you are now.

164.text: That you'll be stronger, wiser, smarter.

169.text: Because you didn't wait for tomorrow. You didn't wait for anything.

175.text: is the difference between I am

180.text: It is the difference between dreaming and truly living.
